DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 45 year ( inclusive ) Day 1 . Female subject must nonchild bear potential . Has receive another new chemical entity ( define compound approve marketing ) participate clinical study include drug treatment within 3 month first administration investigational prod Plasma donation within one month screen blood donation/blood loss > 500mL 3 month prior screen Clinically relevant abnormality physical examination , vital sign , ECG , clinical chemistry , hematology urinalysis
